description.ko: 순수한 에너지가 무지개의 전체 스펙트럼으로 부서지는 순간을 포착한 빛의 기계적 찬가입니다.
description.en: A mechanical celebration of light, capturing the moment pure energy is shattered into the full spectrum of the rainbow.

prompt: A complex, nested glass orrery with multiple spinning polyhedral spheres, refracting a concentrated beam of white light into a room-sized web of rainbow caustics. Intense spectral dispersion, refractive indices, and chromatic aberration occur at every crystal facet. 8k, hyper-realistic, raytracing. Sharp macro focus on the points where light splits into pure energy. Global illumination and cinematic lighting capture the prismatic energy and the rainbow-saturated atmosphere of the light dispersion.
